name: contacts-list
objective: We want to make sure that the Contact widget lists only the user's favourites ‘contacts’
description: The contacts widget displays the user's favourites ‘contacts’ as labelled by Empathy/Folks
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application
- Several buddies are created in IM application
- In both applications, some of them are identified as favourites

steps.expected: Only the user's favourites ‘contacts’ are listed

author: sdx

name: contacts-list-size
objective: We want to make sure that the Contact widget displays a maximum of 5 contacts at one time
description: The contact widget is restricted to a set size of 3 x 3 tiles and displays a maximum of 5 contacts at one time
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application
- Several buddies are created in IM application
- In both applications, more of 7 of them are identified as favourites

steps.expected: the Contact widget displays a maximum of 5 contacts at one time

author: sdx

name: contacts-list-scroll
objective: We want to make sure we can scroll the contacts in the Contact widget
description: If the user has more than 5 favourites, a scroll bar is initiated.
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application
- Several buddies are created in IM application
- In both applications, more of 12 of them are identified as favourites

steps.expected: You can scroll the list of contacts. A maximum of 5 contacts is displayed at one time

author: sdx

name: contacts-details
objective: We want to make sure that the Contact widget displays contacts' details properly pulled from empathy account or from contacts
description: The Contact widget displays a contact avatar, name, presence icon and description
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application. They all have an avatar and at least a name.
- Several buddies are created in IM application. Buddies are added in several accounts associated to several IM services.
- At least One buddy is Online, One buddy is idle, One buddy is offline. They all share some description. They all have an avatar. They all have a nickname
- In both applications, they are all identified as favourites

steps.expected: the Contact widget displays Contact avatar, Contact name, Presence icon and description pulled from empathy account or from contacts

author: sdx

name: contact-badge
objective: We want to make sure that the Contact widget displays contacts' Notification badge
description: The Contact widget displays Notification badge pulled from empathy account or from contacts
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application. One missed audio call is associated to a contact. One missed video call is associated to a contact. One unread message is associated to a contact
- Several buddies are created in IM application. One missed VOIP call is associated to a buddy. One missed video VOIP call is associated to a buddy. One unread instant message is associated to a contact
- In both applications, they are all identified as favourites

steps.expected: the Contact widget displays Notification badge pulled from empathy account or from contacts

author: sdx

name: contact-badge-incremented
objective: We want to make sure that contacts' Notification badge displayed by the Contact widget is incremented when receiving new events
description: The Contact widget displays Notification badge pulled from empathy account or from contacts
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application. One missed audio call is associated to a contact. One missed video call is associated to a contact. One unread message is associated to a contact
- Several buddies are created in IM application. One missed VOIP call is associated to a buddy. One missed video VOIP call is associated to a buddy. One unread instant message is associated to a contact
- In both applications, they are all identified as favourites
- IM application and Contact application are not launched

steps.description: Receive a new message from a contact
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are incremented in the Contact widget

steps.description: Receive a new audio call from a contact
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are incremented in the Contact widget

steps.description: Receive a new video call from a contact
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are incremented in the Contact widget

steps.description: Receive a new instant message from a buddy
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are incremented in the Contact widget

steps.description: Receive a new VOIP audio call from a buddy
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are incremented in the Contact widget

steps.description: Receive a new VOIP video call from a buddy
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are incremented in the Contact widget

steps.description: Repeat previous steps from different contacts and buddies
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are incremented in the Contact widget

author: sdx

name: contact-badge-decremented
objective: We want to make sure contacts' Notification badge displayed by the Contact widget is decreased when opening/answering the events
description: The Contact widget displays Notification badge pulled from empathy account or from contacts
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application. One missed audio call is associated to a contact. One missed video call is associated to a contact. One unread message is associated to a contact
- Several buddies are created in IM application. One missed VOIP call is associated to a buddy. One missed video VOIP call is associated to a buddy. One unread instant message is associated to a contact
- In both applications, they are all identified as favourites
- IM application and Contact applicatio are launched

steps.description: Open the unread message from a contact
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are decreased in the Contact widget

steps.description: Open the missed audio call notification from a contact
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are decreased in the Contact widget

steps.description: Open the missed video call from a contact
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are decreased in the Contact widget

steps.description: Open the chat with unread instant message from a buddy
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are decreased in the Contact widget

steps.description: Open the missed VOIP audio call notification from a buddy
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are decreased in the Contact widget

steps.description: Open the missed VOIP video call notification from a buddy
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are decreased in the Contact widget

steps.description: Repeat previous steps from different contacts
steps.expected: The associated Notification badges are decreased in the Contact widget

author: sdx

name: contact-select
objective: We want to make sure a panel is revealed and retracted when selecting a contact
description: Upon selection the panel is revealed and pushes the next contact down off the widget canvas - a scroll bar therefore appears. If the user clicks on the contact again the panel retracts
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application
- Several buddies are created in IM application
- In both applications, some of them are identified as favourites

steps.expected: A panel is revealed with communication options and pushes the next contact down. A scroll bar appears.
The panel retracts

author: sdx

name: contact-options
objective: We want to make sure options are revealed based on the communication method available when selecting a contact
description: When a user selects a ‘contact’ options are revealed based on the communication method available (IM, voice call or video call)
pre_condition:
- At least one contact is created in Contact application
- At least one buddy is created in IM application
- In both applications, they are identified as favourites

steps.description: Select a contact associated to Contact application
steps.expected: Only Contact options are present (contact icon)

steps.description: Select a contact associated to IM application
steps.expected: Only IM options are present (Instant messaging and VoIP icons)

author: sdx

name: contact-icon
objective: We want to make sure contact icon is displayed and when clicked Contact application is launched and contact's details is shown
description: Opens contacts application on the selected users information page.
pre_condition:
- At least one contact is created in Contact application with photo or avatar
- The contact is identified as favourite

steps.description: Select a contact associated to Contact application
steps.expected: Contact icon is displayed in panel revealed
Contacts application is launched. The selected users information page is displayed.

author: sdx

name: contact-options
objective: We want to make sure options based on the communication method works properly when selecting a contact
description: When a user selects a contact, options are revealed based on the communication method available (IM, voice call or video call)
pre_condition:
- At least one contact is created in Contact application
- This contact is associated to a buddy in IM application. The contact is connected and online.
- IM status is: connected and online.
- This contact is identified as favourite

steps.description: Select a contact associated to Contact and IM applications

steps.expected: IM application is launched. A chat is open with this buddy. Chat history and buddy's status is loaded
IM application is launched. A VoIP voice call is started with this buddy
IM application is launched. A VoIP video call is started with this buddy

author: sdx

name: contact-options-out
objective: We want to make sure options based on the communication method works properly when selecting a contact
description: When a user selects a contact, options are revealed based on the communication method available (IM, voice call or video call)
pre_condition:
- At least one contact is created in Contact application
- This contact is associated to a buddy in IM application. The contact is connected and online.
- IM status is: sign out.
- This contact is identified as favourite

steps.description: Select a contact associated to Contact and IM applications

steps.expected: IM application is launched. Sign in screen is displayed.
A chat is open with this buddy. Chat history and buddy's status is loaded.

steps.description: Repeat previous steps with "VoIP voice call" icon and then with "VoIP video call" icon
steps.expected: Sign in screen is displayed. Then VoIP voice/video call is started with this buddy.

author: sdx

name: contact-removed
objective: We want to make sure they is no incompatibility behavior when a contact has been recently deleted
description: Contacts icon opens contacts application on the selected users information page.
pre_condition:
- At least one contact is created in Contact application with photo or avatar
- The contact is identified as favourite
- Contacts application and Widget Contact are launched

steps.description: Select a contact associated to Contact application
Delete this contact in Contacts application
Click the contact icon in Widget Contact
steps.expected: To be clarified: if possible Widget Contact is refreshed and the contact is no more listed (should be the best behavior) or Contact application try to launch the contact's details view but display an error like "Contact not found"

author: sdx

name: contact-delete
objective: We want to make sure they is no incompatibility behavior when a buddy has been recently deleted
description: Contacts icon opens contacts application on the selected users information page.
pre_condition:
- At least one contact is created in Contact application with photo or avatar
- This contact is associated to a buddy in IM application
- The contact is identified as favourite
- Contacts application, IM application and Widget Contact are launched

steps.description: Select a contact associated to Contact and IM applications
Delete this buddy in IM application
Click the "Instant Message" icon in Widget Contact
steps.expected: To be clarified: if possible Widget Contact is refreshed and the contact is no more listed (should be the best behavior) or IM application try to launch the buddy's chat view but display an error like "Buddy not found"

author: sdx

name: contact-settings-view
objective: We want to make sure we can launch and close settings of the Contact widget
description: The contacts widgets settings view allows the user to remove ‘contacts’ from the contacts widget list.
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application
- Several of them are identified as favourites

steps.expected: Settings is launched. The list of contacts is displayed with checkboxes
You go back to home

author: sdx

name: contact-settings-del
objective: We want to make sure that we can remove a contact from the Contact widget and that there is no impact in Contacts application
description:
The contacts widgets settings view allows the user to remove ‘contacts’ from the contacts widget list.

This will remove their favourite status only and not delete the contact from the account.
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application
- Several of them are identified as favourites

steps.expected: The [Remove] button is displayed
Contact is no more listed
The contact has not been deleted in Contacts application

author: sdx

name: contact-settings-del2
objective: We want to make sure that we can remove a contact from the Contact widget and that there is no impact in Contacts application
description:
The contacts widgets settings view allows the user to remove ‘contacts’ from the contacts widget list.

This will remove their favourite status only and not delete the contact from the account.
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application
- Several of them are identified as favourites
- At least one contact is associated to a buddy in IM application

steps.description: Check a contact associated to a buddy

steps.expected: Contact is no more listed
The buddy associated to the contact has not been deleted in IM application

author: sdx

name: contact-remove-many
objective: We want to make sure we can remove several contacts from the Contact widget
description:
The contacts widgets settings view allows the user to remove ‘contacts’ from the contacts widget list.

This will remove their favourite status only and not delete the contact from the account.
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application
- Several of them are identified as favourites

steps.expected: Only one contact has been deleted

author: sdx

name: contact-remove-all
objective: We want to make sure we can remove all contacts from the Contact widget
description:
The contacts widgets settings view allows the user to remove ‘contacts’ from the contacts widget list.

This will remove their favourite status only and not delete the contact from the account.
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application
- Several of them are identified as favourites

steps.description: Repeat steps 2 to 5 until all contacts has been deleted
steps.expected: All contacts are deleted

author: sdx

name: contact-settings-view2
objective: We want to make sure we can view empathy accounts from settings of the Contact widget
description: A button [View accounts] launches Empathy Accounts
pre_condition:
- Several contacts are created in Contact application
- Several of them are identified as favorites

steps.expected: Empathy Accounts is launched

author: sdx
